scripts.start: watchify -s taggy -do dist/taggy.js src/taggy.js & stylus -w taggy.styl -o dist
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s taggy -do dist/taggy.js src/taggy.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/taggy.min.js dist/taggy.js
scripts.styles: stylus taggy.styl -o dist && cleancss dist/taggy.css -o dist/taggy.min.css
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment
